description: Returns the metadata and content of the entity.

parameters.name: Catalog
parameters.description: Required. The catalog related to the request. Fixed value: AWSMarketplace.

parameters.name: EntityId
parameters.description: Required. The unique ID of the entity to describe.

nested_items.name: EntityType
nested_items.description: The named type of the entity, in the format of EntityType@Version.

nested_items.name: EntityIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier of the entity, in the format of EntityId@RevisionId.

nested_items.name: EntityArn
nested_items.description: The ARN associated to the unique identifier for the entity referenced in this request.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The last modified date of the entity, in ISO 8601 format (2018-02-27T13:45:22Z).

nested_items.name: Details
nested_items.description: This stringified JSON object includes the details of the entity.

nested_items.name: DetailsDocument
nested_items.description: The JSON value of the details specific to the entity.
